2001: A Space Odyssey

Rank: 875


When a mysterious artifact is uncovered on the Moon- a spacecraft manned by two humans and one supercomputer is sent to Jupiter to find its origins.


Director: Stanley Kubrick

Writer: Stanley Kubrick, Arthur C. Clarke

Stars: Keir Dullea, Gary Lockwood, William Sylvester

Tags: Adventure Epic, Artificial Intelligence, Epic, Psychological Drama, Sci,Fi Epic, Space Sci,Fi, Adventure, Sci,Fi
